review1.text: Absolute rigor. FL360 embodies the technical perfection we were looking for.
review1.author: JEAN DUPONT

review2.text: The minimalist and efficient approach of their operations is simply revolutionary.
review2.author: MARIE MARTIN

review3.text: FL360 transformed our airworthiness management. Fearsome efficiency allowing us to focus on the essential: flying.
review3.author: Thomas Anderson

review4.text: Their CAMO expertise allowed us to reduce downtime by 30%. An indispensable strategic partner.
review4.author: Sophie Dubois

review5.text: A turnkey service that exceeds all expectations. Absolute peace of mind for our operations.
review5.author: Marc Weber

privacy.title: 5. Personal Data
privacy.content: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, and delete data concerning you. To exercise this right, please contact us at: privacy@fl360.com.

formation.title: Pilatus PC6 Training & Aerial Work - fl360
formation.meta_desc: Pilatus PC6 B2H4 training and aerial services: surveillance, photography, filming, and advertising.

hero.subtitle: With our training and type ratings on <1>Pilatus PC6 B2H4</1> aircraft

ato.title:
About the training
ATO QT PILATUS PC6
ato.desc: Do you dream of becoming a competent and qualified pilot to fly the robust and versatile Pilatus PC6? Our training program is designed to offer you a unique and enriching experience, allowing you to master this iconic aircraft and develop the necessary skills to evolve in the world of aviation.

type_rating.title: Type Rating & Base Training
type_rating.desc: Obtain your PILATUS PC6 type rating, in accordance with Aviation Authority requirements with our PILATUS PC6 type rating + theoretical base training.
type_rating.note: Available as: Initial Issue, Revalidation, and Renewal.

prereq.title: Pilot Prerequisites (SEP / MEP)
items: Private Pilot License PPL (A) with minimum hours only to operate under NCO
Commercial Pilot License CPL (A) or ATPL (A) frozen theory
English language proficiency FCL 055 for international, ICAO level 4 certificate minimum
Valid EASA Class 1 or Class 2 medical certificate

aerial_work.title: Aerial Work Training
aerial_work.desc: Our experience in the aviation world allows us to offer a wide range of aerial services adapting to client needs and public administration requests.

surveillance.title: Surveillance & Observation
surveillance.desc: Strategic approach for security, defense, and environmental management. Use of advanced technologies for a unique perspective and valuable data collection.

photo.title: Photography & Filming
photo.desc: Capture spectacular images and cinematic videos thanks to our aircraft equipped for high resolution.

ads.title: Aerial Advertising
ads.desc: Promotional flights with banners for massive and creative dissemination. Create an imposing and unmissable display in the sky.

cao_camo.title: CAO / CAMO - Airworthiness Management - fl360
cao_camo.meta_desc: Continuing Airworthiness Management Organization (CAO / CAMO) services for aircraft.

hero.subtitle_line2: A perfect approach to airworthiness management

about.title: About
about.p1: We provide customized solutions for the continuing airworthiness management of your aircraft. FL 360 Aviation perfectly meets your needs.
about.p2: Our CAO / CAMO service aims to maintain the airworthiness of your aircraft, maximizing fleet availability for our clients.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.desc: Our CAO / CAMO service is specifically adapted to your needs, allowing us to offer personalized solutions with great flexibility meeting civil aviation standards.

services_list.title: Complete Oversight & Management
items: Development, revision and control of a maintenance program
Planning and coordination of all scheduled maintenance activities
Evaluation of Airworthiness Directives (AD) and Service Bulletins (SB)
Management of aircraft technical logs and records
Coordination of aircraft defects and AOG situations

needs.title: Your needs
needs.desc: Whether you are an owner, operator, or flying club, you need rigorous and flawless monitoring of your fleet in compliance with regulations and perfect control of technical status.

offer.title: Our offer
offer.desc1: After a thorough preliminary inspection, we initialize your fleet in our information system to trace a complete history.
offer.desc2: We ensure regulatory monitoring, determine maintenance deadlines, and provide required reports for airworthiness reviews.

needs.title: Your needs
needs.desc: You have just bought or sold an aircraft. Before its acceptance / delivery, you must be sure of its physical integrity and the completeness of technical data.

offer.title: Our offer
offer.desc1: We support you for integration and start of operations by conducting an in-depth technical study and physical inspection of the aircraft.
offer.desc2: At the end of operations, FL360 Aviation assists you with the sale of the aircraft or its return to the lessor.

maintenance_program.title: Maintenance Program
maintenance_program.desc: For several years, we have provided personalized Maintenance Programs meeting Part M requirements under M.A.302. We also hold "Indirect Approval" authorization allowing us to provide an MP APPROVED by our Airworthiness Manager, avoiding submissions to OSAC.

progdigital.title: ProgDigital
progdigital.subtitle: Our indispensable tool dedicated to airworthiness tracking management.
progdigital.desc: This software offers assistance in tracking aircraft maintenance operations for optimal airworthiness status. Designed for Part M subpart G organizations managing aircraft fleets.
features: User-friendly interface and quick learning curve
Print all necessary documents in a few clicks
Compatible with all Windows operating systems

mro.title: MRO - Maintenance & Parts - fl360
mro.meta_desc: Maintenance, repair, and spare parts services for aircraft.
mro.more_info: Other maintenance parts may be available upon request.
